name: Gift of the Zodiacs
description:
Made for the 1-Bit Weekend #2 game jam.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move left and right
  • Space bar - Activate your Zodiac ability
  • Esc - Go back to the title screen

Overview:

Let the Zodiacs bestow their abilities on your quest to enter the Door of Fate and achieve enlightenment in the stars!

Pass through Zodiac Gates to gain the ability of its resident Zodiac. However, once you pass through a Gate, you'll have to leave your previous ability behind, since the Zodiacs can be a jealous bunch.

Tips:

  • If you get stuck, you can always restart the level.
  • Make sure you don't accidentally teleport outside of the level with Gemini!

Credits:

Art/animation/programming: Byazzle
SFX: LetterAfterZ
Music: "Icarus' Kid" - LetterAfterZ
Special thanks to LetterAfterZ, Bek & No Johns and the Bayside Boys
